r2b2.odm.model
Class AhpModel

java.lang.Object
  r2b2.odm.model.AhpModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class AhpModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Holds and manages the data of an AHP decision. Interface for controllers to access the AHP data.

Author:
Alex
